text: Anyone know if its possible to modify blog comments like you can the blog loop/listing/post pages? The default comments and how it is setup really limits the ability for designing them.
hello - can someone from the COS dev team please help here on this forum post? <https://integrate.HubSpot.com/t/original-source-drilldown-is-missing-when-submitting-a-form/3021>

Is there anyway through HubL/Jinja to update a meta tag? For example, the open graph tag, I'd like to add in something to the regular description. Or even add in a Twitter Label / Data tag to the header `<meta name="twitter:data1" content="Data"><meta name="twitter:label1" content="Label">`. This can't be done via JS as it wont be read by the validators or checks. I would prefer to pull this value from a variable on the page.
